attributes.action: make the HPV vaccine readily available to boys of school age in additon females
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The HPV vaccine not only offers protection against cervical cancer in females, but also against penile cancer and genital warts in males. Despite this, the vaccine is not offered to boys in schools like it is to girls. This is wrong as it is putting many boy's health at an unnecessary risk when there is a vaccine readily available
